text.tspan: [user has selected a metro area and a data category]
[This is the dashboard view for the chosen metro area and data
category. It presents data for each indicator within the category.
Each indicator can have multiple measures (e.g. change, share, or
level) which will be presented using simple text data points and/or
using charts. Each measure will be given context, either by comparing
with the U.S. or by situating the metro area in the full distribution of
